name: Make it gone
description:
Move with A and D or arrows, jump witch space and destroy object with mouse - easy as that.

You can restart level witch R.

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Font used in game -  zone38.net by codeman38.

SFX made in sfxr.

Code and grafhics made by me from scratch.

Playtesting - my friends.

Music made at https://www.beepbox.co/
